1.content:
As you're taking a walk through the forest, you find a brightly glowing portal. Curious, you walk through it. The rest is darkness.
You wake up only to find yourself in some strange place, and you've shrunk to an inch! Suddenly, there is a loud rumbling, and you look around to find...
1.title: New world?

choices: The Vortigaunt that had passed you came back
11.content: You heard an odd sound, and saw a Vortigaunt step over you, as though it were in a hurry for something. You figure that wherever it was going, you wanted no part of it, and quickly started heading in another direction. You walk through the forest a bit, stumbling over roots that were sticking out and the like. It was hard work getting around at this size, that was for sure. You jumped as you felt something connect with your back, and you began to rise. It was...
11.title: Vortigaunts

111.content: You look up to see a that a huge Barnacle has managed to catch you with its slimy tongue. You try to get off the tongue, but it's hopeless, you continue to rise higher and higher as the beast draws you closer. You are about 1 meter high now, do you...
111.title: A Barnacle tongue

112.content: Yep, it's definetly human. 5 fingers, connected to a normal arm, all that jazz. As the person picks you up, you realize the hand belongs to...
112.title: A human hand

info.brief_description: You're in the Half-Life universe, and the you've shrunk!
info.description:
You find a strange portal in the forest, and when you walk into it, you find yourself on the border world of Xen! What aliens will you meet there?

Anything is allowed. Sex encouraged- the story is rated 18+ for a reason!
